subject: Football
Tests and Examinations
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A psychological assessment, given in addition to the long-used Wonderlic test, resembles exams given to firefighters because they, like football players, must make quick decisions under stress.
snippet: A psychological assessment, given in addition to the long-used Wonderlic test, resembles exams given to firefighters because they, like football players, must make quick decisions under stress.
